title: Kanojo x Kanojo x Kanojo: Sanshimai to no DokiDoki Kyoudou Seikatsu
synopsis: Haruomi Shiki's peaceful life on a small island was shattered when a volcano erupted and destroyed his home. He goes to stay with a relative, where he meets the sexy sisters Natsumi, Akina, and Mafuyu Orifushi, who he immediately finds himself attracted to.
characters: ['Orifushi, Mafuyu', 'Orifushi, Akina', 'Orifushi, Natsumi', 'Shiki, Haruomi', 'Byakudan, Midori', 'Himenohara, Suzuran']
